short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an animated, clickable University of California logo to UC-affiliated webpages. Sound effects included.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a humorous version of the new University of California logo to all UC websites. Animations are triggered upon mouseover, while clicking on the logo will open a new tab linking to the following URL:

http://www.change.org/petitions/university-of-california-stop-the-new-uc-logo 

Sound effects are also included. Google Chrome will ask you for permission to play sounds before they trigger.

Enjoy!

DISCLAIMER

This extension was built solely for humorous purposes, and is in no way intended to be a malicious or direct attack on the University of California logo or education system.

The logo and all affiliated graphics used in this extension rightfully belong to the University of California. I grant University of California all rights and privileges to take down this Chrome extension if they so desire.

Audio files courtesy of http://soundjax.com/.
